reviewText: What a great resource! We are treated to many veil movement ideas that I can't wait to use in a ministry piece! The dance that is taught in Part 2 gave me chills! Pastor Lynn goes to great pains to help us learn this anointed dance by carefully taking it piece by piece and explaining all segments.

What a great resource! We are treated to many veil movement ideas that I can't wait to use in a ministry piece! The dance that is taught in Part 2 gave me chills! Pastor Lynn goes to great pains to help us learn this anointed dance by carefully taking it piece by piece and explaining all segments.

I was blessed right out of my socks with this DVD! You will too if you choose to watch and participate; know that your heart is free! You will learn lots of different expressions on how to express your over flowing love of Gods love for yourself and others.

I was blessed right out of my socks with this learning experience! You will too if you choose to watch and participate; know that your heart is free! You will learn lots of different expressions on how to express your over flowing love of Gods love for yourself and others.

This dvd increased my desire to dance with a Veil. Pastor Lynn teaches and demonstrate great movements in a solo,group dance. She also gives an absolutely beautiful dance choreography.  You are going to love it .
This topic is amazing. You will teach a great choreography step by step with your veils. A must have.

This is an awesome DVD!  I had no idea how many ways veils/scarves can be used in dance and how much beauty it adds to any choreography.  It also includes the step by step instruction and demonstration for an entire dance using these flowing props.

This is an awesome DVD!  I had no idea how many ways veils/scarves can be used in dance and how much beauty it adds to any choreography.  It also includes the step by step instruction and demonstration for an entire dance using these flowing props.
Don't have a lot of space to worship or would love to learn more about other ways to worship with something in your hand?  This is the dvd for you!  You will learn so much!

This is a great video with so many ideas to do with veils and scarves and they bring beauty and flow to the choreography.  I love that the veils bring in another dimension to the dances and the music is so beautiful and anointed.  You will want to get the music CD that is available on Dancing For Him's website along with this DVD to use to teach your team these dances.  You will be glad you did.

This is a great video with so many ideas to do with veils and scarves and they bring beauty and flow to the choreography. The Veil and Dance Video is very good. I enjoyed how many different ideas for the use of veils were presented in the video. This video is really good to enhance choreography incorporating veils. It's another great DFH resource for praise dancers/choreographers who want to take their dance to another level.

The Veil and Dance Video is very good. I enjoyed how many different ideas for the use of veils were presented in the video. This video is really good to enhance choreography incorporating veils. It's another great resource DFH for praise dancers/choreographer who want to take their dance to another level.

This DVD opens up a wonderful new world of the creative things we can do with scarves and veils!!  Beautiful breathtaking and dramatic to see each group presenting their dances in a workshop setting!!  I hadn`t thought of using scarves before in worship but seeing this DVD gave me so many new ideas!
